commandDescription: Validates alignment between XML and CSV representations of global value sets using string comparison or logic comparison
inputFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of global value set names to validate (without extension). If not specified, all global value sets will be validated
modeFlagDescription: Validation mode: 'string' for full string comparison, 'logic' for in-memory structure comparison (default: %s)
validationSuccess: ✅ Global Value Set '%s' is properly aligned
noGlobalValueSetsFound: No global value sets found to validate
validationSummary: Validation Summary: %s global value sets validated, %s aligned, %s misaligned
